ai.summary: A short, easy 0.8 km footpath hike on Crowan FP 117 in the United Kingdom. Suitable for beginners and casual walkers seeking a quick countryside stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: A short, gentle route along a well-maintained footpath. Expect flat to gently undulating terrain with compacted earth, gravel, and some grassy sections. Gates or stiles may be encountered; footing is generally firm but can become muddy after rain.
ai.safety_notes: This is a very short, easy route. Best with sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Check the forecast, as conditions can change quickly. Watch for livestock and road crossings near farmland. Bring a phone or map for navigation, and carry water if it's hot.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with particularly pleasant conditions in late spring to early autumn.

seo.title: Crowan FP 117 – 0.8 km Easy UK Footpath Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover Crowan FP 117, a short and easy 0.8 km hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners seeking a quick countryside stroll.
